articles.author: Rebecca Rubin
articles.title: Box Office: ‘Ghostbusters: Afterlife’ Starts Strong With $44 Million, ‘King Richard’ Whiffs - Variety
articles.description: Popular on Variety The box office ain’t afraid of no ghosts. “Ghostbusters: Afterlife,” a sequel to the 1980s sci-fi comedy classic, opened at No. 1 in North America, collecting a solid $44 million from 4,315 venues. The better-than-expected result is an enco…
articles.content:
The box office ain’t afraid of no ghosts.
“Ghostbusters: Afterlife,” a sequel to the 1980s sci-fi comedy classic, opened at No. 1 in North America, collecting a solid $44 million from 4,315 venues. … [+6332 chars]

articles.title: The truth behind the Great Resignation: Americans are sick of low-paying, dangerous jobs - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: "If employers really wanted to end the Great Resignation, they could raise wages and make their businesses a more humane place to work," says Paul Constant.
articles.content: The signs, posted at fast food restaurants and shared all over social media, have practically become a cliche by now: "WE ARE SHORT-STAFFED. PLEASE BE PATIENT WITH THE STAFF THAT DID SHOW UP. NO ONE … [+4147 chars]
